body_html: @tatatodd Ok, I had some progress here. I tried all the stpes above in a VirtualBox ubuntu machine. It seems that VirtualBox is not fully activating all of these CPU instructions, so in runtime (import tensorflow) I got this error. Do you know how to fully activate it in VirtualBox?

body: @tatatodd Ok, I had some progress here. I tried all the stpes above in a VirtualBox ubuntu machine. It seems that VirtualBox is not fully activating all of these CPU instructions, so in runtime (`import tensorflow`) I got this error. Do you know how to fully activate it in VirtualBox?
